DOC.brief_summary: A randomized open-label , multiple dose , three-treatment , three-period , six-sequence , crossover study investigate pharmacokinetic drug interaction Atorvastatin Ezetimibe oral administration healthy volunteer
DOC.brief_title: CKD-391 DDI : Atorvastatin Ezetimibe Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: Outcome Measures 1 . Primary endpoint AUCτ , s , Cmax , ss atorvastatin free ezetimibe 2 . Second endpoint 1 ) AUCinf , s , Cavg , ss , % fluctuation , tmax , s , t1/2 , CL/Fss , Vd/Fss atorvastatin free ezetimibe 2 ) AUCτ , s , AUCinf , s , Cmax , s , tmax , s , t1/2 , metabolic ratio 2-hydroxy atorvastatin free ezetimibe
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age Eligible Study : 19 Years 45 Years 2 . If male , Body weight ≥ 55kg , If female , Body weight ≥ 50kg 3 . BSA ≥ 18.5 , < 25 4 . Accepts healthy volunteer 5 . If female , Negative pregnancy test screen pre dose Day 1 6 . The subject agree perform contraception study 7 . The subject agree write informed consent 1 . The subject impair hepatic function , renal function , nervous system etc . 2 . The subject gastrointestinal disease surgery effect absorption Investigational product 3 . The subject high blood pressure low blood pressure ( Systolic blood pressure > 150mmHg < 90mmHg , Diastolic blood pressure > 100mmHg < 50mmHg 4 . The subject abnormal Laboratory test ( AST , ALT > 1.25 fold upper normal limit , Total bilirubin > 1.5 fold upper normal limit , CPK > 2 fold upper normal limit , Estimated Glomerular filtration rate < 60mL/min/1.73m2 Modification Diet Renal disease formula 5 . The subject drug abuse history within 1year Positive urine drug test screen 6 . The subject take prescription medicine whch effect metabolism Investigational product within 14days 7 . The subject take counter drug whch effect metabolism Investigational product within 7days
